title: Could Kuss Fill a Vingegaard Void, Is There Really a GC ‘Big 4’, and More: What the Dauphiné Will Tell Us about the Tour de France
content:
Here are three hot topics to keep tabs on next week when the Tour de France peloton warms its legs at the Critérium du Dauphiné.

Read the full article at Could Kuss Fill a Vingegaard Void, Is There Really a GC ‘Big 4’, and More: What the Dauphiné Will Tell Us about the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
